org.deuce.transaction.tl2cm.cm
Interface ContentionManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractContentionManager, Aggressive, BackoffCM, Karma, KarmaLockStealer, LockSkipper, Polite, Polka, Suicide, Timestamp
public interface ContentionManager

This interface describes a Contention Manager object. A Contention Manager object is in-charge of resolving conflicts between threads.

Since:
1.2
Author:
Yoav Cohen, yoav.cohen@cs.tau.ac.il

Nested Class Summary
static class ContentionManager.Action
          Action to be taken by the thread calling a contention manager
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getDescription()
          Gets a description of this contention manager
 boolean requiresPriorities()
          Whether or not this contention manager requires the STM system to collect priorities for each thread
 boolean requiresTimestamps()
          Whether or not this contention manager requires the STM system to maintain timestamps for each thread
 ContentionManager.Action resolve(WriteFieldAccess contentionPoint, Context contending, Context other)
          Resolves the conflict between the two threads
 

Method Detail

resolve

ContentionManager.Action resolve(WriteFieldAccess contentionPoint,
                                 Context contending,
                                 Context other)
Resolves the conflict between the two threads

Parameters:
contentionPoint - The resource the threads are contending on
contending - The thread that attempts to acquire the resource
other - The thread the holds the resource
Returns:
Action to perform by contending thread

requiresPriorities

boolean requiresPriorities()
Whether or not this contention manager requires the STM system to collect priorities for each thread

Returns:
true is this contention manager requires priorities, false otherwise

requiresTimestamps

boolean requiresTimestamps()
Whether or not this contention manager requires the STM system to maintain timestamps for each thread

Returns:
true is this contention manager requires timestamps, false otherwise

getDescription

java.lang.String getDescription()
Gets a description of this contention manager

Returns:
description
